training_captions: Compact three-pad SMD package—one RF feed and two grounds—optimized for mounting at a PCB edge with a small reference ground to achieve high efficiency in the 6.24–6.74 GHz band.
Embedded UWB radiator delivering ~6.5 dBi peak gain and ~70% efficiency on the eval board; performs best with ≥3 mm clearance to nearby metal.
Small C-band UWB chip element tuned for centimeter-level positioning (TOA/AOA); linear-pol, omni behavior and medium fractional bandwidth (~7.7%).
